item.description:
Join Federator N°1, Kina Zoré, and Endangered Speeches for the end of the world (according to the Mayan Calendar).

Three of the Boston's awesome afro-centric dance bands throw down for this special show. The end of the world? Or just the completion of a cycle? Whatever you believe, this will be a fun party - and don’t you think the end of the world might be safer in a “church”?

Cover: $12, or $20 for 2 people (so bring a friend for end-of-times savings!)

Where: Church of Boston, 69 Kilmarnock Street Boston, MA

This event is 21+

For more info:
http://www.federator1.com/
http://www.facebook.com/EndangeredSpeechesMusic
http://www.kinazore.com/
https://www.facebook.com/events/385701401505121/
item.name: Federator N°1, Kina Zoré & Endangered Speeches!
